title: Santosh Sivan filming his next Hollywood film in Britain
text: Added on October 3, 2015 NewsWire Santosh Sivan filming his next Hollywood film in Britain Thiruvananthapuram, Oct 3 (IANS) Acclaimed Indian cinematographer and director Santosh Sivan is busy cranking the camera for his next Hollywood film “Lies We Tell” at Leeds in Britain. Sivan said the shooting began last month. “We have completed half of the shoot and we plan to finish the shoot by end of next month,” Sivan told IANS on the phone. The film, which is being put out by Bradford International Film Associates Limited. will be ready for release next year. Sivan said the cast includes Harvey Keital, Gabriel Byrne and loads of British and Asian actors. Fifty-one-year-old Sivan, who is known for films like “Roja”, “Asoka” and “The Terrorist” among several others, is also the first South Asian to be honoured with a membership of the most prestigious American Society of Cinematographers ( ASC).
